c7ac81cd-0fa1-4c4b-a3c6-40680250f16f.name: Solar Power Subsystem
c7ac81cd-0fa1-4c4b-a3c6-40680250f16f.description: A lightweight and portable solar power system with flexible panels and compact battery storage.

embodiment.principle: Flexible Photovoltaic Panels with Compact Battery Storage
embodiment.description: Uses lightweight, flexible solar panels and compact lithium-ion batteries for portability.

physics_models.name: Energy_Budget
physics_models.coding_directives:
def energy_budget(solar_irradiance, time):
    return solar_irradiance * 0.18 * time
physics_models.python_code:
def energy_budget(solar_irradiance, time):
    return solar_irradiance * 0.18 * time
physics_models.coder_notes: Solar irradiance is constant at 300 W/m².
assumptions: Solar irradiance is constant at 300 W/m².

c7ac81cd-0fa1-4c4b-a3c6-40680250f16f.verification_plan: The solar power subsystem will be verified through testing under various solar irradiance conditions to ensure it meets the energy requirements.

85dd928c-685a-4663-aa24-a911f12daf17.name: Filtration Subsystem
85dd928c-685a-4663-aa24-a911f12daf17.description: A lightweight and compact ceramic filter with basic pre-treatment.

embodiment.principle: Compact Ceramic Water Filter with Basic Pre-Treatment
embodiment.description: Utilizes a lightweight ceramic filter with basic pre-treatment stages.

physics_models.name: Flow_Rate
physics_models.coding_directives:
def flow_rate(filter_area, permeability, viscosity):
    return (filter_area * permeability) / viscosity
physics_models.python_code:
def flow_rate(filter_area, permeability, viscosity):
    return (filter_area * permeability) / viscosity

85dd928c-685a-4663-aa24-a911f12daf17.verification_plan: The filtration subsystem will be tested for flow rate and filtration efficiency under various water quality conditions.

bf31c842-8fd9-451e-9f82-4bf4f22331d9.name: Water Quality Monitoring Subsystem
bf31c842-8fd9-451e-9f82-4bf4f22331d9.description: Compact sensors for pH, turbidity, and TDS with basic display.

embodiment.description: Incorporates compact sensors for pH, turbidity, and TDS with a simple LED display.

physics_models.name: Sensor_Response
physics_models.coding_directives:
def sensor_response(sensor_delay, processing_time):
    return sensor_delay + processing_time
physics_models.python_code:
def sensor_response(sensor_delay, processing_time):
    return sensor_delay + processing_time
physics_models.coder_notes: Constant sensor delay and processing time.
assumptions: Constant sensor delay and processing time.

bf31c842-8fd9-451e-9f82-4bf4f22331d9.verification_plan: The water quality monitoring subsystem will be tested for accuracy and response time under various water conditions.

a67b5465-19da-4cb7-aa3e-e7a964df038c.name: Power Management Subsystem
a67b5465-19da-4cb7-aa3e-e7a964df038c.description: A compact charge controller with basic battery management.

embodiment.principle: Compact Charge Controller with Basic Battery Management
embodiment.description: Uses a compact charge controller and basic battery management system.

physics_models.name: Charge_Discharge
physics_models.equations: Battery Level = Initial Charge - (Discharge Rate * Time)
physics_models.coding_directives:
def battery_level(initial_charge, discharge_rate, time):
    return initial_charge - (discharge_rate * time)
physics_models.python_code:
def battery_level(initial_charge, discharge_rate, time):
    return initial_charge - (discharge_rate * time)

a67b5465-19da-4cb7-aa3e-e7a964df038c.verification_plan: The power management subsystem will be tested for charging and discharging efficiency under various load conditions.
